summary: Website project named "VlogunrealPromo" to offer/generate AI promotional videos for brands such as restaurants, hotels, etc.
known_issues: Portfolio/Created Videos section: video is not visible/displaying for the user (cannot see video on portfolio).

existing_features.title: Create a responsive marketing website for the brand name “VlogunrealPromo” that targets Restaurants, Hotels, and similar businesses looking for AI promotional videos.

Implement core site sections/pages: Hero, Services/What you get, Industries (Restaurants/Hotels/etc), How it works, Pricing (informational only), Examples/Portfolio gallery, FAQ, and Contact/Request CTA.

Add a “Request a Promo Video” form that collects lead details and requirements, including: business name, business type (Restaurant/Hotel/Other), contact name, email, phone/WhatsApp, location (city/country), website/social links, desired video length, desired style/mood, language, deadline (date), budget range, and free-text notes.
Connect the frontend form submission to the backend using the project’s actor integration and manage submission state with React Query (loading, success, error).
Add an “Examples” gallery section that showcases multiple promotional video concepts using static thumbnail cards (title, short description, and image).

Apply a coherent, distinctive visual theme appropriate for a premium promo-video studio: cinematic dark neutrals with warm accents (avoid blue/purple), modern typography, and consistent spacing/components across all sections.

Add a static assets integration to render the generated brand images (logo/wordmark/hero/examples) from frontend/public/assets/generated and use them in the appropriate sections (header/hero/examples).

Create a new frontend section (e.g., "Created Videos" or "Portfolio") that displays the created videos from the backend as a responsive grid of cards using the existing design system, showing thumbnail, title, and short description.

Add an admin-only UI to add and delete created videos from the portfolio: when the current Internet Identity principal is recognized as admin, show a management panel with an "Add Created Video" form and per-item delete controls.
Update site navigation to include a link to the new Created Videos/Portfolio section, matching the existing header navigation behavior (smooth scroll to section).

Update the admin "Add Created Video" form to allow adding a new portfolio video without manually providing a thumbnail URL when the Video URL is a supported YouTube link, by auto-deriving a thumbnail URL from the YouTube video ID.
Add a simple inline "preview" area in the admin "Add Created Video" form so the admin can verify the pasted video URL and derived/provided thumbnail before creating the portfolio item.
Adjust admin-form validation copy to clearly explain what fields are required and when the thumbnail is auto-filled for YouTube URLs, using English user-facing text.

Fix portfolio video playback by making YouTube URL parsing robust so common YouTube formats (including youtu.be links, youtube.com/watch?v=, youtube.com/shorts/, youtube.com/embed/, and links with extra query parameters) correctly produce an embeddable iframe URL in the portfolio viewer modal.

Add resilient thumbnail fallbacks in the portfolio grid cards and viewer fallback state so broken/missing thumbnail URLs do not result in an empty/blank video card; instead show a visually neutral placeholder and keep the card clickable.

Improve the Created Video viewer modal fallback UX when a video cannot be embedded: display a clear English message explaining that the video cannot be embedded and provide a prominent "Open Video in New Tab" action that always works.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create the "VlogunrealPromo" website for brands (restaurants, hotels, etc.) to get AI promotional videos
Persist promo-video requests in the Motoko backend canister with stable storage and expose an API to create a new request and fetch a request by its reference ID.
Add capability to upload/add created promotional videos to the website (e.g., portfolio/gallery) so the owner can showcase completed work

Extend the Motoko backend canister to support storing and serving a list of completed/created promo videos (portfolio items), including fields for an ID, title, description, video URL, and thumbnail URL.

Add an admin permission model for managing created videos using Internet Identity principals: only an admin principal can add/delete created videos; non-admin users can only view the created videos list.
